title: Primož Roglič makes it look easy with formality victory in Vuelta a España tune-up
content:
'I came here to improve, I think I did that'. Victory at Vuelta a Burgos sees Roglič swagger toward Vuelta unbeaten in season's stage races.

Read the full article at Primož Roglič makes it look easy with formality victory in Vuelta a España tune-up on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
